dataMapping.title: Yield Optimization Timeline
dataMapping.subtitle: Seasonal yield patterns and revenue optimization schedule
dataMapping.overallObjective: Primary yield objective (e.g., 'Increase overall yield by 25% through strategic optimization')

phases.primaryLabel: Seasonal optimization phase (e.g., 'Valentine Season Yield Boost', 'Christmas Premium Positioning', 'Summer Yield Recovery')
phases.description: Seasonal yield characteristics and optimization strategies
phases.expectedOutcome: Expected yield improvements and revenue impact
phases.budget: Revenue projection (e.g., '+$450K revenue increase', '35% yield improvement')

milestones.milestoneLabel: Yield milestone (e.g., 'Premium Pricing Launch', 'Yield Target Achievement', 'Revenue Optimization Complete')

dependencies: Prerequisites (e.g., 'Historical yield analysis complete', 'Competitive pricing research ready')

successMetrics: Success criteria (e.g., 'Achieve 25% yield improvement', 'Maintain 95% fill rate', 'Revenue growth > 30%')
riskFactors: Risk factors (e.g., 'Market volatility', 'Competitive pressure', 'Demand fluctuation', 'Pricing sensitivity')
